body.name: Taskalo Anti-theft Ring Doorbell Door Mount All- Metal Case Bracket, Compatible with Ring Doorbell1/2/3/4, Not Block Doorbell Sensor, Support No Drill and Drill Holes Two Types of Installation

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 21 mins
features: 【METAL PROTECTION SHELL】 We put a lot of effort into upgrading the metal shell of the doorbell bracket, with a beautiful appearance and sturdy and durable

【TWO TYPES OF SIMPLE INSTALLATION】Our ring doorbell bracket can be mounted on wall (need drill holes) or installed on door (no drill), and we provide the corresponding kits. You can choose the installation methods according to your like.
【COMPATIBLE DOORBELL】 Compatible with ring doorbell 1,2,3, &3 Plus,4,(2020/2023 Release), Please check the left picture No.2 for Compatible model No. (Doorbell is Not Included )

【COMPATIBLE DOOR】 Our ring video doorbell door mount is suitable for most kinds of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, and left or right opened door (OUTWARD OPENED DOOR IS NOT FIT). The thickness of the door must be between 0.78 inches and 2.36 inches. You can measure your door thickness before ordering

【PACKAGE INCLUDE】 Door clip bracket*1, metal doorbell case*1, screwdriver*2, anti-theft screws *6; 3pcs plastic stopper+3pcs fixing screws (For drilling to install), a small sponge, an instruction manual (DOORBELL NOT INCLUDE). Any problem with received products or installation, please feel free to contact us, we will resolve it for you immediately. Follow your heart, add to your cart!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy Installation. The ring doorbell door mount is great for apartment, condo, rental, business, etc.

TWO TYPES OF INSTALLATION- Choose the installation method you preferRELIABLE MATERIAL- The ring doorbell mount adopts premium stainless steel material and looks more class and posh, and all door contact surfaces with the bracket are covered with anti-scratch spongesEASIER INSTALLATION- Optimized design, say goodbye to tedious installation steps. Only 1 anti-theft screw loosen for recharging.COMPACT APPEARANCE- Perfect fits for ring doorbell battery, no need for other sponge filling required.
Notice: Outward opened door is not fit
Doorbell Mount Two Kinds of Installation
Warm Tips: The Doorbell Camera is NOT included in the package.Please confirm the type and size of your door before ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best no-drill ount on the market!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a no-drill mount for my Ring Doorbell and read quite a few reviews before deciding on the Taskalo. Many reviewers (for other mounts) complained about the "cheap plastic housing." I was just about to give up on finding an all metal mount when I ran across the Taskalo. It's all metal, easy to assemble and works perfectly. I feel that my doorbell is a little safer with a metal housing v's a plastic housing. I highly recommend giving this one a try. Thank you, Taskalo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a number of Ring doorbell mounts, they all had flaws where they were oversized and didn't come with enough wedges for the Ring device to mount properly, or the craftsmanship was weak or holes didn't line up properly.This product does come with 1 square pad for the back panel, but My 2nd gen wireless Ring fits in it perfectly, the metal security screws are nice and thick unlike others I tried, and there are extra screws just in case you lose any.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect amount for a ring doorbell. It is all metal. It is vented. It is easy to install. I loved it. Unfortunately my apartment has a new steel fire door. This offset the door just enough so that the locks were no longer aligned and it was difficult to lock and unlock the door. I would have had to call in a locksmith to realign everything.So, sadly, I returned it.However, I’m sure it would fit most other doors. It is perfect. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality with 1 small issue
reviews.reviewText: This is a great idea we have a metal door in our office that we can't drill into and we didn't want to use double-sided tape cuz we wouldn't be able to get it off after so I purchased this item to hold our ring doorbell. Overall the build quality is really nice the only downside is that the screw that secures it from the bottom is too short and you need to exert some Force to get it to catch because if you just try to spend it normally you will strip it out so I ended up just finding a longer screw and putting it on there but if you can overcome that it is a pretty solid item especially for an apartment or office where you cannot damage the door

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It bends when you tighten it.
reviews.reviewText: The brace that goes around the door is weak and bends when you tighten it. Also the part you tighten against the door stick out about two inches. This could be a lot stronger and cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great case for ring doorbell
reviews.reviewText: Great case for my ring for my apartment the set up was easy and it mounds to the door super easy. Glad I got this case

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy product. Protects my ring doorbell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Almost good, but...
reviews.reviewText: Good fit for the Ring (2nd generation). It doesn't leave a lot of open spaces like other cases. I like the color and the modern, sleek design. The only drawback is the door c-clamp. The quality is questionable. This metal piece (including the long screw) bends to the left when I screw it on the door to tighten. So, I'm not sure if it will hold or eventually break apart when being removed/re-installed for battery recharging. Only time will tell. It's made in China so all "long lasting" bets are off. I'll update this review - and re-rate accordingly - in case it breaks prematurely due to normal use. I'll keep it for now since returning stuff to Amazon is a chore that I hate doing.
Está bien fabricado y el material es de buena calidad. Hasta el momento no me han robado el ring, así que supongo que funciona bien.

It’s a pretty solid product. Frame and support are made of metal/steel so you know it would last. Came with mounting instructions and installation tools, a BIG plus! Don’t need to scramble for screw drivers! Carefully packaged. Overall a good product. May not be the cheapest out there, but you get the bang for your buck!
Lo recomiendo ampliamente, materiales de excelente calidad
